remarks: The argument of a function value belongs to the preimage of any class containing the function value.  Raph Levien remarks:  "This proof is unsatisfying, because it seems to me that ~ funimass2 could probably be strengthened to a biconditional."  (Contributed by Raph Levien, 20-Nov-2006.)
statement: fvimacnv $p |- ( ( Fun F /\ A e. dom F ) -> ( ( F ` A ) e. B <-> A e. ( `' F " B ) ) ) $.
